metadata.name: Decode Base64 Encoded Text -MacOs
metadata.comment: Detects usage of base64 utility to decode arbitrary base64-encoded text

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/bin/base64') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-d')))

output.summary: Detects usage of base64 utility to decode arbitrary base64-encoded text
